name: Paranormal Observation
description:
Paranormal Observation is a single-player point-and-click ghost hunting game.

Start your new career as a paranormal investigator with the latest weapon in ghost hunting, your computer. Ghost hunting has become more and more dangerous these days, so you won't go directly into the building, but stay close to the events. Your paranormal observation room is located downstairs in the cell, in most cases it is safe to be there, but not always. 

Each investigation brings a new experience, each ghost has different behaviors that will help you to determine the ghost. There are different types of difficulties and buildings to explore. 

Your computer is equipped with the latest tools for paranormal observation, it has a room specific electromagnetic field (EMF) meter, a temperature meter, a sound meter and a UV light to see what you wouldn't see with normal light. 

With each completed investigation, you can earn money and experience that will help you unlock new upgrades, see new buildings and complete even more complicated missions.
